batteries.name: Amazon Basics 48-Pack AA Alkaline High-Performance Batteries
batteries.description: The Amazon Basics 48-Pack AA Alkaline High-Performance Batteries provide reliable 1.5-volt power suitable for various devices, including game controllers, toys, flashlights, and digital cameras. With a long-lasting, 10-year leak-free shelf life, these batteries are perfect for emergency storage or immediate use. They come in Certified Frustration-Free Packaging for easy access and storage. Please note that these are single-use batteries and are not rechargeable; for rechargeable options, consider Amazon Basics rechargeable batteries. For heavy-duty needs, Amazon Basics also offers Industrial AA batteries.

batteries.name: Duracell Coppertop AA Batteries with Power Boost Ingredients, 24 Count Pack
batteries.description: The Duracell Coppertop AA Batteries come in a 24-count pack and are formulated with patented Power Boost Ingredients, ensuring lasting performance for a wide range of household and office devices. These alkaline batteries are guaranteed to last for 12 years in storage, providing reliable power when you need it most. Trusted by consumers, Duracell is the #1 battery brand for essential devices like remotes, cameras, flashlights, and toys. Each battery is backed by quality assurance, with a guarantee against defects in materials and workmanship. Duracell CopperTop batteries are available in multiple sizes, including AAA, C, D, and 9V.

batteries.name: Energizer AA Batteries, Alkaline Power Double A Battery, 32 Count
batteries.description: The Energizer Alkaline Power AAA Batteries come in a convenient 32-count pack, providing long-lasting power for a variety of devices. These alkaline batteries are ideal for everyday use, including powering TV remotes and other household gadgets. Trusted for their reliability, Energizer batteries ensure consistent performance across multiple applications.

batteries.name: Powermax 24-Count AA Batteries, Ultra Long Lasting Alkaline Battery
batteries.description: The Powermax 24-Count AA Batteries offer ultra-long-lasting alkaline power in a reclosable package for easy storage and organization. Each battery provides 1.5 volts, making them suitable for a variety of everyday household devices, including wireless mice, flashlights, clocks, remote controls, and digital cameras. With a remarkable 10-year shelf life, these batteries ensure reliable performance over time. Additionally, Powermax batteries are environmentally friendly, containing no mercury or cadmium, making them a safe choice for both your family and the planet. Please note that these are single-use batteries and are not rechargeable.

batteries.name: Duracell Coppertop AA Batteries 28 Count Pack
batteries.description: The Duracell Coppertop AA Batteries come in a 28-count pack and are formulated with patented Power Boost Ingredients for long-lasting performance. Each battery is guaranteed to last for 12 years in storage, ensuring they're ready for use whenever needed. Designed for everyday household devices, they power items such as TV remotes, gaming controllers, cameras, flashlights, and toys. Duracell is a trusted brand, known for quality and reliability, with all products guaranteed against defects in materials and workmanship. These batteries are available in various sizes, including AAA, C, D, and 9V.

chocolates.name: HERSHEY'S Milk Chocolate Candy Bars
chocolates.description: The HERSHEY'S Milk Chocolate Candy Bars come in a bulk box containing 36 individual 1.55-ounce bars. Perfect for elevating candy dishes, gift-giving, and s'mores, these classic milk chocolate bars are kosher and gluten-free, ensuring lasting freshness for on-the-go snacking. Ideal for birthday parties, concession stands, graduations, anniversaries, movie nights, and campfires, they offer a delicious treat for any occasion. These full-size bars feature the creamy, beloved HERSHEY'S milk chocolate that has been a favorite for decades, making them a great addition to any seasonal celebration or holiday event.
chocolates.ingredients: MILK CHOCOLATE [SUGAR; MILK; CHOCOLATE; COCOA BUTTER; MILK FAT; LECITHIN (SOY); PGPR; NATURAL FLAVOR]

chocolates.name: Ferrero Rocher Premium Chocolate Bars, Milk Chocolate Hazelnut & Almond
chocolates.description: The Ferrero Rocher Premium Chocolate Bars come in an 8-pack, featuring the exquisite taste of Ferrero Rocher in a convenient bar format. Each 3.1-ounce bar is individually wrapped and combines smooth milk chocolate with roasted hazelnuts and a creamy filling enriched with almond pieces, creating a memorable indulgence. Perfect for celebrating everyday moments, these premium chocolate bars enhance any occasion with their luxurious flavor and texture. Crafted from high-quality ingredients, Ferrero Rocher chocolates are known for their irresistible layers, making them a delightful treat for chocolate lovers.

chocolates.name: Kinder Bueno Milk Chocolate and Hazelnut Cream, 2 Individually Wrapped Chocolate Bars Per Pack
chocolates.description: The Kinder Bueno Milk Chocolate and Hazelnut Cream pack includes 30 individually wrapped packs, each containing two delicious chocolate bars. Each 1.5-ounce pack features smooth milk chocolate with a dark chocolate drizzle, encasing a crispy wafer and pockets of creamy hazelnut filling for a sensational taste experience. These shareable bars are perfect for enjoying with friends or adding to your favorite desserts. Whether you're treating yourself during a coffee break or enjoying a movie night, Kinder Bueno offers a delightful chocolate treat in the right size for any occasion.
chocolates.ingredients: MILK CHOCOLATE (SUGAR, COCOA BUTTER, COCOA MASS, SKIM MILK POWDER, BUTTEROIL, LECITHIN AS EMULSIFIER, VANILLIN: AN ARTIFICIAL FLAVOR)

chocolates.name: Lindt CLASSIC RECIPE Milk Chocolate Candy Bar, Milk Chocolate
chocolates.description: The Lindt CLASSIC RECIPE Milk Chocolate Candy Bar weighs 4.4 ounces and offers a gourmet experience with its creamy, smooth milk chocolate, perfect for a classic sweet indulgence. Ideal for gifting, baking, or enjoying on its own, this candy bar is portioned into bite-sized pieces for easy enjoyment anywhere. Crafted with premium ingredients, Lindt's milk chocolate bar guarantees a delightful treat that satisfies any chocolate craving.
chocolates.ingredients: SUGAR, COCOA BUTTER, MILK, CHOCOLATE, SKIM MILK, SOYA LECITHIN (EMULSIFIER), BARLEY MALT POWDER, ARTIFICIAL FLAVOR.

chocolates.name: Taza Chocolate Organic Amaze Bar 95% Stone Ground, Wicked Dark, Vegan
chocolates.description: The Taza Chocolate Organic Amaze Bar features a 10-count pack of 2.5-ounce Wicked Dark (95%) chocolate bars. These bars are certified USDA Organic, Non-GMO Project Verified, Kosher Certified, and made through Direct Trade, ensuring quality and transparency. They are all-natural, gluten-free, dairy-free, soy-free, and vegan. Crafted in Somerville, MA, Taza uses traditional Mexican stone mills to grind cacao, resulting in perfectly unrefined, stone-ground chocolate with bold flavor and texture. This indulgent chocolate is a delicious treat for any time of day.
chocolates.ingredients: Organic cacao beans, organic cane sugar.
